ambidexterity.name: Ambidexterity
ambidexterity.description: Able to use two weapons of the same type simultaneously during attacks adding their bonuses. Individual weapon encumberance or size must be lower or equal to [x].

attraction.name: Attraction
attraction.description: Move a mini into your area by performing an automatic manipulation. They must possess a clear line of sight and be at a disatance lower or equal to [x]. Their size index must also be lower or equal to yours.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.description: Add [x] white [diePlural] to each melee attack. Only active when at least half of [characterName]'s energy cubes are in [gender] wound zone.
berserk.altTileDesc: Add [x] white [diePlural] to each melee attack. Only active after losing at least half [characterName]'s life points.

blast.name: Blast
blast.description: Once per turn, spend an automatic manipulation to trigger a level [x] explosion in your area and in an adjacent area with clear line of sight.

bodyguard.name: Body Guard
bodyguard.description: Allied minis located in the same area as [characterName] increase their defense by [x] automatic success[plural].

burst.name: Burst
burst.description: After neutralizing an enemy with a ranged attack, any remaining successes can be used on [x] other mini[plural] with a clear line of sight.

circularStrike.name: Circular Strike
circularStrike.description: After neutralizing an enemy with a melee attack, any remaining successes can be used on [x] other mini[plural]

combo.name: Combo
combo.description: When a mini is neutralized during a melee attack, gain a free melee attack, of [x] [dieColor] [diePlural], without any weapon bonuses, against another mini.

counterAttack.name: Counter Attack
counterAttack.description: After an enemy resolves a melee attack against [characterName], perform a free melee attack on the attacker with [x] yellow [diePlural], without weapon bonus benefits.

cry.name: Cry
cry.description: Once per turn, trigger a level [x] explosion in your area and in an adjacent area with a clear line of sight, ignoring the Spend Energy Cube step. [characterName] is not wounded during this explosion.

electricity.name: Electricity
electricity.description: If you manage to exceed an opponent's defense, inflict [x] automatic wound[plural] before the rest of the attack's wounds are applied as usual.

eliteCommand.name: Elite Command
eliteCommand.description: Chooes an elite level tile from your side and [x] corresponding minis that start the mission in [characterName]'s area. Activate these by performing an automatic thought action. Each energy cube spent on defense, reroll, or move for the friendly minis is moved to [characterName]'s thought space.

flame.name: Flame
flame.description: During an attack or after an explosion, place [x] flame token[plural] in the corresponding area. Each token adds 1 level of dangerous terrain to this area. The owner is immune to this effect.

fly.name: Fly
fly.description: Move by flying. Ignore hindering and difficult terrain when moving. Also ignore additional costs and effects of special moves.

frost.name: Frost
frost.description: During an attack or after an explosion, place [x] frost token[plural] in the corresponding area. Each token adds 1 level of difficult terrain to this area. The owner is immune to this effect.

grenade.name: Grenade
grenade.description: Perform a complex manipulation to trigger a level [x] explosion in an area with the difficulty equal to the disatance between your area and the targeted area. If failed, the explosion occurs at a distance equal to the number of successes obtained along the line of sight.

hacking.name: Hacking
hacking.description: Benefit from [x] automatic success[plural] during specific thought actions listed in the scenario setup.

harmless.name: Harmless
harmless.description: During an attack, normal wounds you inflict are reduced to 0.

henchmanCommand.name: Henchman Command
henchmanCommand.description: Choose a henchman level tile from your side and [x] corresponding mini[plural] that start the mission in [characterName]'s area. Activate the mini[plural] by performing an automatic thought action. Each energy cube spent on defense, reroll, or move for the friendly mini[plural] is moved to [characterName]'s thought space.

horror.name: Horror
horror.description: The move point cost of enemies entering [characterName]'s area is increased by [x].

imaginaryFriend.name: Imaginary Friend
imaginaryFriend.description: Gain 1 additional yellow die for all your actions from "a little voice in your head". To nullify this effect, an opponent in your area must perform a complex thought of difficulty [x].

immobilization.name: Immobilization
immobilization.description: If at least [x] wound[plural] is dealt, the wounded mini is laid down. Standing requires using the Move Point Bonus for the First Movement.

impenetrableDefense.name: Impenetrable Defense
impenetrableDefense.description: Benefit from [x] automatic defense success[plural] against melee attacks.

investigation.name: Investigation
investigation.description: Benefit from [x] automatic success[plural] during specific thought actions listed in the scenario setup.

lockPicking.name: Lock Picking
lockPicking.description: Benefit from [x] automatic success[plural] during specific manipulation actions listed in the scenario setup.

luck.name: Luck
luck.description: Benefit from [x] free reroll[plural] whenever rolling dice as [characterName].

marksman.name: Marksman
marksman.description: Add [x] automatic success[plural] during a ranged attack if you have obtained at least one success.

martialArts.name: Martial Arts
martialArts.description: Add [x] automatic success[plural] during a melee attack if you have obtained at least one success.

misfortune.name: Misfortune
misfortune.description: Force an enemy in your area to reroll [x] [diePlural]. You may choose the [diePlural] to reroll after any free rerolls.

munitionsSpecialist.name: Munitions Specialist
munitionsSpecialist.description: Benefit from [x] automatic success[plural] during specific manipulation actions listed in the scenario setup.

nervesOfSteel.name: Nerves of Steel
nervesOfSteel.description: Ignore [x] enemy menace index[plural] when performing ranged attacks, manipulations, or thoughts.

parkour.name: Parkour
parkour.description: Ignore [x] jump or climb level[plural] when performing a special move, and [x] wound caused by a fall.

pointBlank.name: Point Blank
pointBlank.description: Benefit from [x] free reroll[plural] when targeting a mini in your area with a ranged attack.

poison.name: Poison
poison.description: If you manage to exceed an opponent's defense, inflict [x] automatic wound[plural] before the rest of the attack's wounds are applied as usual.

protected.name: Protected
protected.description: Avoid being the target of an attack if [characterName] is accompanied by at least [x] allied mini[plural] without this skill.

pushingLimits.name: Pushing Limits
pushingLimits.description: Self inflict [x] wound[plural]. Cubes moved to the wound zone by this skill are considered to have been spent on the current action, regardless of exertion limit.

reach.name: Reach
reach.description: Target a mini that is not present in your area but possesses a clear line of sight for a melee attack. It must be at a distance lower or equal to [x].

reducedMobility.name: Reduced Mobility
reducedMobility.description: [characterName] cannot perform special moves (climb, jump, and fall).

regeneration.name: Regeneration
regeneration.description: During the Declare Heroes' Stance step, move [x] cubes from your wound zone to your fatigue zone.
regeneration.altTileDesc: At the start of [characterName]'s activation, recover [x] life points.

retaliation.name: Retaliation
retaliation.description: After resolving a ranged attack against [characterName], perform a free ranged attack upon the attacker with [x] yellow [diePlural], without any weapon or elevation bonuses. Requires a ranged weapon.

sacrifice.name: Sacrifice
sacrifice.description: Declare the use of this skill during the Create the Dice Pool step or an enemy attack. Take [x] success[plural] from the attack as undefendable wounds if it targets an ally mini in your area. The remaining successes are applied as usual to the defender.

shackle.name: Shackle
shackle.description: On a successful melee attack, place [x] shackle token[plural] on the defender. No wounds are inflicted by this attack. The shackled mini has their successes reduced by [x] when performing attacks, thoughts, manipulations, or defenses. These tokens can be removed by performing a successful complex manipulation of difficulty [x] (even by allied minis in the same area).

smokeGrenade.name: Smoke Grenade
smokeGrenade.description: After triggering an explosion in an area, place [x] smoke grenade tokens there. During ranged attacks, attackers must count the number of smoke grenade tokens in areas that their line of sight passes through. This total is subtracted from their number of attack successes

sneakAttack.name: Sneak Attack
sneakAttack.description: When [characterName] attacks an enemy in [gender] area, if the total menace indexes of allies is equal to or higher than the total menace indexes of enemies in that area, add [x] automatic success[plural] to the attack.

support.name: Support
support.description: Provide [x] free reroll[plural] to all the allied minis in [characterName]'s area.

tactician.name: Tactician
tactician.description: Perform an automatic thought action to immediately grant [x] free move point[plural] to an allied mini that hasn't been the target of this effect this turn. Character minis also get their Move Point Bonus for the First Movement.

toxicGas.name: Toxic Gas
toxicGas.description: During an attack or after an explosion, place [x] gas token[plural] in the corresponding area. Each token adds 1 level of dangerous terrain to this area. The owner is immune to this effect.

untouchable.name: Untouchbale
untouchable.description: Benefit from [x] automatic defense success[plural] against ranged attacks.

wallbreaker.name: Wall Breaker
wallbreaker.description: Move through a level [x] or lower wall at a movement cost raised by 2, placing a broken wall token on it. The two areas become adjacent and crossable and possess clear line of sight.
